thread.title_full: First Lady Michelle Obama Shares A Sweet Throwback Photo After the President’s Farewell Address

author: Theresa Avila
title: First Lady Michelle Obama Shares A Sweet Throwback Photo After the President’s Farewell Address
text: On Tuesday night, not long after President Barack Obama’s farewell address ended, Michelle Obama decided to share a little something on Instagram. In his speech, the president gave a heartfelt tribute to Michelle, Sasha and Malia. So it makes sense that the first lady would reciprocate all that love in... More »
